name: type
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: type
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a particular group of people or things that share similar characteristics and form a smaller division of a larger set

example.eg: There were so many different types of bread that I didn't know which to buy.
example.egtrans: 面包种类繁多，我不知该买哪一种。

example.eg: What type of clothes does she wear?
It was dark so I didn't notice what type of car it was.
example.egtrans: 天太黑，我没有注意到是什么车型。

example.eg: He's the type of man you could take home to your mother.
example.egtrans: 他是那种你可以带回家见母亲的男人。

example.eg: He's very attractive, if you like the blond, athletic type.
example.egtrans: 假如你喜欢白肤金发、爱好运动那一类型的话，他算是很有魅力的。

example.eg: They sell dried flowers and baskets and that type of thing.
example.egtrans: 他们卖干花、花篮之类的东西。

example.eg: We have a range of moisturizers for all different skin types.
example.egtrans: 我们有一系列适合各种肤质的润肤品。

example.eg: She was young and she was wearing student-type clothes, so I assumed she was studying here.
example.egtrans: 她年龄不大，穿得又像学生，所以我还以为她在这儿上学。

example.eg: He took me to a bar full of actor types trying to get noticed.
example.egtrans: 他带我去了一个酒吧，那里到处是演员一类的人，希望能引起他们的注意。

trans_examp.trans_en: a person who seems to represent a particular group of people, having all the qualities that you usually connect with that group

example.eg: He doesn't use fully rounded characters in his plays - he uses types.
example.egtrans: 他在剧中不用个性丰满的人物——他用的是类型化的人物。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to be the type of person that someone thinks is attractive
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 是（某人）喜欢的那种类型

example.eg: He's a nice enough guy - he's just not my type.
example.egtrans: 他人倒是挺好，只是不是我喜欢的那种类型。

example.eg: I would have thought Ben was more your type.
example.egtrans: 我还以为你会更喜欢本这种类型的人。

dsense.name: type
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the style and size of printed letters used in a piece of printed writing such as in a newspaper, book, or article

example.eg: Use bold type for your headings.
The software allows you to choose from over 20 styles of typeface.
example.egtrans: 用这种软件有20多种字体可选择。

name: type
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: type
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to write using a machine, either a computer keyboard or a typewriter
trans_examp.trans_cn: （用电脑键盘或打字机等）打字

example.eg: She asked me to type a couple of letters.
I was typing away into the early hours of the morning just to get it done.
example.egtrans: 我打字打到凌晨，就为把事情做完。
